doctor.name: Dr. Abdullah Al Morshed
doctor.info: Dr. Abdullah Al Morshed is a Rheumatologist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Rheumatology). He is a Consultant, Rheumatology at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Abdullah Al Morshed at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong is 2:30pm to 5pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

chamber.address: 20/B, K. B. Fazlul Kader Road, Panchlaish, Chattogram

doctor.name: Dr. Nasim Reza Chowdhury
doctor.info: Dr. Nasim Reza Chowdhury is a Rheumatologist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Rheumatology), ECRD (Switzerland). He is a Consultant, Rheumatology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Epic Healthcare, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Nasim Reza Chowdhury at Epic Healthcare, Chittagong is 6pm to 10pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: 19, K.B. Fazlul Kader Road, Panchlaish, Chattogram

doctor.name: Asst. Prof Dr. Abdul Mahin Tazbir
doctor.info: Asst. Prof Dr. Abdul Mahin Tazbir is a highly qualified Rheumatology specialist in Chattogram, holding an MBBS and MD in Rheumatology from BMU, along with an ECRD from Switzerland. He currently serves as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Rheumatology at Enam Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Tazbir specializes in treating various rheumatic diseases including Arthritis, Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA), Spondyloarthritis (SpA), Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE), and Osteoporosis. He provides consultations at National Hospital, Chittagong, located at Room-4022, 14/15 Dampara Lane, Mehedibag, Chattogram, with visiting hours from 3pm to 6pm on Thursday and Friday.
